record.dc:title: 72BT2, 15BT2, Butler County, Kentucky. Annis Mound. Feature #51, Structure outline on Sub-Primary mound.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Mississippian Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: Structure outline, F #51, on Sub-Primary mound surface, has double postmold lines on three of the four sides. Here the outer line of shallow postmolds has been sliced vertically, on the east side. Behind it lies the inner postmolds line. The ground at this time of year was frozen to a depth of several inches. View from northeastward. See also photos 73, 74, 75.
